content.detailedDescription:
Me and a few mates were chilling in the park just after midnight, we always went there after work as it was the middle point for all our homes, we'd have a cigarette, then head off our seperate ways.

one of my mates pointed somebody out who was in the bushes, watching us.

we all thought it was a pervert or something & started throwing stones at it/ him. (we were all young & yobbish at the time)

we watched as this thing slowly crept out the bushes towards us. it was crouching over slightly, it was a silvery, shimmering colour, but it also appeared to be glowing. it had extremely long, gangly, arms which it used to move the bushes to get out, it wasn't touching the bushes as they moved though. as it got out of the bushes, it fully stood up & was at least 8 foot tall & it's arms stretched down to where a persons knees would be, really long arms. couldn't really distinguish any facial features as it was dark & i was hypnotized by those extremely long arms.

there was only one thing going through my head as i watched this thing for a minute or two, run! my fight or flight instincts properly kicked in & i totally feared for my life. being a young yob though, my decision was always based on what my mates would do... i turned to them but they weren't there, they had already ran off. i took another look at this thing & it was a step or two closer, less than 15 feet away from me. i never ran so fast in my life. i didn't look back through fear of how fast the thing could move, i just didn't want to be the last person in the group. i have never been so scared in my life. none of us stopped running for a while, we ran all the way down the lichfield road & all the way to new cross hospital. we needed to be around people, to feel safe.

we went back the next day as i'd lost my phone & keys as i ran off. we investigated the area in the bushes where we saw it, the bushes had a metallic type of smell & they all looked 'off'.

i have never been back to that park/ field since.
content.summary: Encountered an unknown creature while with a few others.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a military exercise with my reserve unit at the meaford military ranges near meaford ontario.
it was probably shortly after midnight and i was sitting by a campfire talking with someone else just trying to keep warm as it was a cold night.
it was about mid april and the sky was clear.
i saw the approx. nine reddish/orange lights in the distance.
the lights moved rapidly and kept changing formation shapes.
i think they were first in a triangular formation and changed to circles,square shapes,etc. and after a few minutes within five or ten they disappeared.
i was amused by the quick movements of the objects and the formations they changed to.
the objects were quite far away and just disappeared.
the event occurred between midnight and approx. 02:00 am. probably a sunday morning so i did not really have access to a clock as we were on a field exercise so i cannot really say of their was a loss of time.
the person who i was talking to before the event did not talk to me about it afterward and he is not known to me before or after the incident. just a fellow soldier.
content.summary: There was approx. nine red lights in the sky quite far away. they started in pyramid type shape and then rapidly changed positions to other shapes circles squares,etc. after approx. five or ten minutes possibly less the lights just disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back deck recording storm clouds coming in.The sky turned from blue to gray. it was steadily becoming more windy before it rained. i later reviewed what i recorded on my phone and noticed two bright discs crossing the sky at a enormous speeds. i tried to be logical and give myself the explanation that it was a plane or jet. it was not. it was going too fast. i think i would've saw the objects immediately while recording if they we're going the speed of a plane. unfortunately i was unable to tell if the objects had sound because of the wind.When i stilled the recording frame by frame and enlarged the objects they looked like two discs. the top was gray/chrome colored the middle gave off a red orange glow and the bottom was gray/chrome colored again. when you review the recording look at the trees at left of screen it's right in the beginning of the recording at 0:03 when slowing or stilling the recording at pause. i am curious and awestruck to know what it is that i recorded that night. i would love an explanation.
content.summary: I was recording a storm coming in on my cell. when i reviewed what i recorded on my phone i noticed two speeding bright objects cross the sky. in my opinion they were going to fast to be a plane or jet.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Summer 1995. i just turned 17 years old, wasn't a drug or alcohol consumer. i was alone at home, or my mom was sleeping i can't remember that part, when i heard a sound coming from the backstreet. someone was trying to do a rub in a house when neighbors was in vacation. a old lady went out of her own house and scream on the rubber. i laugh when i saw him going back in his car and left. it was a full moon evening. i take a look at her and saw something, a light coming from east and going straight ahead west.  suddenly, the light goes down and pass in front of the moon. at this time, i saw an teardrop shape object. as fast as it arrived, it turned back to the south and disappeared. 

from my house, i've estimated that thing was over jarry street near the old miron quarry, so 1 miles from me, bird flying distance, about 1 miles and half by car.
content.summary: Ufo passing before the full moon

content.detailedDescription:
I went back from the convenient store, when i saw a long cigar shape object, looks alike an airbus 330 without any wings, flying about 200 feets from the ground, and near 800 feets from me.  i find something wrong, caused that ''airplane'', that's what i tought first before noticing there's no wings, was very too near from the ground. we are having an airport few miles from here, and that wasn't the altitude they are flying usually. i still focused my attention on the object, finally notice the absence of wings and another detail hit me. there was no sound of engine or nothing. the object was flying approximately at 30 miles/hour. i opened the door of my house and told my wife to go out on the balcony.  when she was outdoor, i pointed the object in the sky. his trajectory changed a bit. i first saw it on east side, and now it was on the north side of my house, going west. my wife saw it too.

the sky was clear and temperature was around 37,4f (3 celsius), no cloud.
content.summary: Cigar object flying slowly

content.detailedDescription: 1st contact/ 1st ever encounter. i honestly did not expect it, it actually happened within my own household, minding my own business. watching tv with my dad, you know...Being an average 15/14 year old. it was around 10pm, getting a bit late for me at that age, so i then i decided to head off into my room, placed my laptop there, plugged it into charge, i then had an urge to go to the toilet, so yeah', from what i can remember when i came back to my room, i was shocked! i didn't scream. i could not move for a bit. i saw a humanoid figure, very bright white light gleaming from this '' light being'' at the time that's the only thing i could remember calling it straight after the experience. at the time, obviously for a teenager at that age, would be terrified. at the time i was very quick to just dismiss it as an hallucination but i never had history when it comes to hallucinations. anyway, there' was more to it than that. soon as i saw this ''light being'' for some reason, my vision zoomed into a specific region of her body, such as her head and shoulder, tried to quickly see if i can identify who this ''thing'' was. i couldn't, i was scared to stay in the room any longer, i felt a very strong presence in the room, it was the most strangest thing i have ever experienced. i ran out of my room quickly, shut the door and the weirdest part of that moment is that the woman spoke to me telepathically, sounding very gentle and sending ''positive'' emotions to me, i did start to feel calm but i was too cautious to let my guard down. i felt like i was under threat, it then became clear to be that i had my first or one of the first contact experience i have had with a ''light being''  but i really wanted this woman to just leave, i couldn't see her face, it was too bright and honestly, the presence also felt warm...I was freaked out as you could tell. when i asked her to leave, in my mind. i spoke to her, telepathically. yes i did communicate to her telepathically, it was very strange and i don't know how i did that, it is strange and i felt crazy at the time, when she went, i felt really upset, trapped and also asked why me, why did this occur, what was that, what did she want? but at the same time i felt excited and relieved simply because i have possibly  encountered e.T/inter dimensional beings and that is the greatest discovery that any man or human
content.summary: Human like entity, made mainly of light. was very bright, warm and radiant. telepathic entity

content.detailedDescription: about 10 ,yrs ago my wife and i were returning from holiday in cyprus and were in an plane about 30,000ft above austria . my wife said " look at this " . i looked out of the window and there at a distance that i would judge to be about a mile away was a black triangular craft . it was like a triangle stood on its base point upper most. it move slowly form the front of the plane to some way behind ,still staying about the same distance away . it then ,without stopping or changing direction , turned through 180 degrees and flew back in the same direction as us but at an incredible speed . it was gone in seconds. we were not the only ones to see this . every one on that side of the plane was looking at it as were as many other as could get to a window .The object must have been enormous because to us it looked to be about 4 inches tall from the distance of a mile
content.summary: Black triangular shaped object standing on its base point upper most

content.detailedDescription:
right lets get this straight. at first. the first time i heard the humming noises. i dismissed it as a plane, quite quickly or a helicopter circling the area, like what aircraft do while they wait to land at an airport. i know manchester airport, isn't so far away from here. (i hope that is okay to put)   what made me first notice this object? , humming noise, it was making me really curious as to what it is, it sounded  a bit unfamiliar. i  had an urge , overwhelming urge to go out and look, when i did. i was paralyzed. not with fear though. shock. still this very day, i am trying to understand what i actually saw, military top secret craft? maybe an hallucination? i was skeptical for a while till i discovered other people have seen similar or same thing as i all over the world. not just here where i am. i recently (2016) looked at mufon map website, noticed, that in my area, someone else has witnessed a ufo sightings around 2012.  which  may be linked to my own case. 
i have done my absolute best to make sure that my memories are accurate as possible. making sure i am not mixing my memories with something else like associating it with a dream but i know.For a fact. i was not dreaming. 

it was actually an amazing experience. it's crazy to even say this but i saw a triangular ufo outside in the front garden, very low in the sky, flying around the houses, quietly....Humming/slight buzzing sound coming from the craft. now weeks/days before this, i did hear this ''humming/buzzing'' sound prior to this event. when i saw the triangular ufo, it was shining this red beam of light/dark red laser. more than one beam of light, like it was searching the area for something. i don't know. right before this experience i was on my laptop, after watching a video which made me feel ''spiritually '' enlightened. i felt amazing. i was meditating as well. i have the strong desire to lift humanity upwards. unfortunately i just don't know how. i had goosebumps whilst watching a video on youtube, now i don't know exactly what it was. i don't seem to remember about that. but when i saw the u.F.O it  did hover! like didn't fall or moved it just stayed there. 30ft or more above the ground, just above the height of my house, but i could see inside the cockpit, it was white, really bright inside but i could see humanoid figures inside the craft. it was a black looking craft on the outside with long small windows at the front to allow their pilots to see. you know. i didn't feel scared at all...Just love. paralyzed. i could not move. i wanted to, so i can take a picture or record at least but i was in the front 

i remember first seeing it, it was going around and searching the area, i saw 'laser lights' dark red.  it was quietish but can still hear humming. i heard these  same noises for weeks prior to the event but thought nothing of it

i am not too sure if it happened in 2011/2012 but i definitely have experienced this and  now 2016, i can remember it still. this sort of thing will never go away.I am lucky to experience this. 


i have attached a file below. a pdf file. it does say 2010/2011 , in all honestly. i actually don't remember the exact year but i do know for sure it happened to me. 

i give you a great detail what i have encountered but alien and ufo encounters.

all of this has affected me psychologically, made me fall into a deep depression, i was experiencing this ,also verbal and physical bullying when i was at school, i am afraid of ridicule. my family are skeptical and they're not as open minded as mufon and other agencies are. for years i have felt alone but also at the same time, excited. i have contacted an alien being, a light being in the past. i wish to see her again, this time, without being afraid, it was a shock to me.   

feel free to review this case and my have a look at my synopsis. it goes into more depth. 
i remember soon after it went. i could move. i was shocked, felt love. i had tears in my eyes. i was also a little bit annoyed, nervy. that i did not tell anyone straight away, i could not move i wish i did, but i kept it to myself.  i felt sick, depressed. months after, couldn't sleep  but it settled down over the years, but every time i recall that memory. i get a headache, i see a vision of me standing there, seeing this amazing craft.

it is definitely something going on.
content.summary: occured around 2010-2012 exactly at 2am or at least  a few mins to or after 2am.

content.detailedDescription:
It was one of those wonderful sightings throughout the year of 2013 . i indeed was pleased that the large ufo has returned again on the 11th dec 2013 ( took 3 photos) & also about the same time the following day of 12th dec. (took 9 photos). all info regarding the time , location etc is included on the 3 photos that i'm attaching here . these photos of this very bright , ever changing by rotating very quickly , it felt as if mesmerized by such a display in the sky at sunset :} it had changed shapes , colors & observed rotating speed plus the movements of going into each shape , it glowed in between those changes , at times as i recall , it became smaller then it became quite large . i actually did thought others would notice it ! it was so obvious & in plane view . 
in the report i've marked the section of airplane being in the sky t & after the sighting , but can't be exactly sure if it was on the 11th or the 12th that this occurred , sorry but some of my notes are in the other computer . i have watched this whole thing approx 5 min or so , afterwards when i went back home realized my watch was few minutes off etc. as for the next day sighting i did made a report but i don't recall the # of it , also couple of photos i did sent to george & those did appeared on his filer's files .
btw , it's hard to send all the material on this site since i rather have many images . last year i've tried to directly forward a file full of images but received an email from your hq that it couldn't be opened (?).
content.summary: Same " object " yet 3 different shapes on photos , visual observation: it rotated extremely fast !

content.detailedDescription:
I am now 56 years old. in 1978, my friend and i (both 18) drove to the given location, parked and began to drink a beer before going to one of the final high school parties preceeding our   senior graduation. we parked right beside the lighted water tower at the given location.
only a few moments after parking, still seated in the car, we both noticed a white light on the sw horizon; it was moving at what seemed to be impossible speeds over great distances, and was making direction changes that defied understanding. this display was happening in the skies above whiteman airforce base and sedalia, mo.
although i could not i identify the object, my instincts told me it was something i had never seen before nor had understanding of.
the object continued with it's aerial show for a couple of minutes and then began to close on our location. the white light seemed to bound forward for a distance (getting closer) and would then go stationary as if hovering ; over a period of about a minute, it appeared larger and larger before us. eventually, a very large object with 4 prominent lights appeared in the farm field directly in front of us. approximately 150-200 feet above the ground, it was drifting very slowly/silently toward our location beside the water tower. it came to a stationary hover over and exactly centered above the water tower and us (still in the vehicle). i observed single large white lights on the 3 corners and one apparently larger white light in the center.
all the while this event was unfolding, the car engine was shut off, the exterior lights were off and interior dome light was on illuminating us from inside. as the object came to it's hover above us and the water tower, i slid my upper torso out of the fully rolled down passenger door window and looked up in utter amazement. i was viewing a nearly totally silent triangular object, hundreds of feet in length on all sides suspended above me. it blocked out the night sky; and for me, had a detectable audible hum. i quickly looked over at my friend to register his response to the phenomena. as my head turned, i saw his hand reaching up to to turn off the dome light inside the car. at the very instant the car's dome light was switched off, a barely visible reddish beam of light was projected form the object down onto us. i felt the nearly invisible light against him skin as if feeling pressure in the air or static electricity. dust particles inside the vehicle seemed to rise up and suspend in the air before me. this light was only shown on us for a few seconds and went out. i then placed my torso back outside the passenger side window of the vehicle and looked back up at the object. it began drifting slowly toward the nw for about 10 seconds, after which it instantly disappeared from sight in a streak white of light.
oddly, i never felt fear during this incident; instead, i was filled with a sense of wonder and amazement. i intuativly felt i was seeing something that represented military tech which we the people did not yet know of. 
my friend and i both agreed that mentioning this event could bare undesirable consequences for our futures and we agreed never to mention the incident. only after many years had gone by did we speak of this again.
 i joined the us military only days after this incident and eventually served in 2 branches, followed by a police career in a major west coast city. i later served in international missions for various organizations as a peacekeeping advisor.
at 56, it is strange to me that i am experiencing an awakening of sorts at this time; but i know we are being lied to; i also sense it it's time to divulge the truth.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A friend and i observed a light in sw night sky rapidly excelerateing/unbelievable direction change. it closed on our location and hovered directly above us. it briefly projected a light beam down onto us and then disappeared into the nw sky in an instant

content.detailedDescription:
My name is jaya kumari & i live at pragati nagar. yesterday while returning from office to my home by bus, i saw a flying object approach from the west sky moving towards the east at a expected elevation of 100ft from ground, moving at the speed of normal flight coming from far behind.
the shape of the flying object didn't seem normal to me, so i made an effort to observe carefully by looking outside the bus window. as i leaned out to see the object, i saw the bottom of a octagon shaped disk size of 250sq.Ft room with 4 red lights around the disk. i was able to see it for about 7 seconds. it seemed to be a heavy metal disk shaped object. it approached at a slower speed but as i leaned out to see it, it zoomed at an immense speed suddenly right above my head. the red lights started to blink frequently as it flew at a high speed.
the lights made me see the object.
i thought it was a flight.
i was surprised as i had never witnessed such a thing, left me thinking about it more and more, kind of getting drawn to it. i am normal doing my daily activities but there is a certain thought that is continuously making me to know more about it.
the object came, hovered and then blasted off to the eat sky.
content.summary: While returning from office to my home by bus, i saw a flying object approach from the west sky moving towards the east at a expected elevation of 100ft from ground, moving at the speed of normal flight coming from far behind but blasted off suddenly.

content.detailedDescription:
First saw a reddish orb, and a smaller white object slightly above, but ahead of the larger object. it remains the same, for the time it took me to get my phone to get the picture, but it then completely changed to a large bright object, with several smaller objects circling the largest one. again, i was able to get pictures, but then it just disappeared.  had i not gotten any pictures, i wouldn't believe that i saw it. 
i was a passenger in a vehicle, and stopped behind several cars, that weren't moving.
i first saw a large, almost glowing reddish object, and i am not sure why it caught my attention, as it was off to the right and up pretty high.
i was literally questioning my eyes.  i asked my partner, if he was seeing the same thing i was. neither one of us could explain what it was, but i know that it wasn't a plane! 
we kept looking at it, and trying to figure it out, and then looked ahead,realized that traffic wasn't moving. the object(s), just disappeared.
content.summary: First saw a reddish orb,with a yellow tail and a smaller white object slightly above, but ahead of the larger object

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from greenville, nc to wilson, nc, us 264 had recently been bypassed making for a quicker trip through the country.

it was about 2:00 am. a friend and i were driving home after visiting friends in greenville. 
my friend was an avid aeronautics fan, and he could identify most aircraft from any country. his knowledge was phenomenal. there was no moon. the night was clear and star-laden. we passed a housing development and shortly afterward saw what appeared to be a bright helicopter headlamp shining towards us about 800 feet in the air to the northwest. as my friend peered at it, he noticed it was not moving and was getting brighter. so i pulled my truck off the road, and we got out. i had binoculars in the truck, so we looked at it through them. we could only see a bright light – no material object.

as we took turns looking at the light, without warning, a craft appeared over the tree line to our right, about 400 feet up, and glided directly toward us, descending. we were both startled and amazed. it came closer to the earth and moved at a constantly slowing speed; no earthly aircraft could move as slowly without falling out of the sky. it was not a dirigible or “weather balloon”. it was nothing mike could identify – and this intrigued him. it made no sound.

i grabbed the binoculars and looked at it. this time i could see a distinct shape. it was like an ice-cream cone pointing upward. the flat part of the cone was facing the earth. on the back of the cone, near the bottom flat part, was what looked like a small hull or house or hut of some kind. it was about a fifth of the size of the cone itself. out of this structure came a very faint blue light. the object passed directly over our heads at about 15 mph. that’s how slow it was going.

when it passed over us, it banked clockwise and came to a standstill over the adjacent field on the other side of the road. it simply stopped. it did not fall. it did not quiver. it sat there motionless, about 100 feet off the ground. it was about 60 feet tall and the flat part was about 30 feet wide. it had a pewter-like ability to reflect ambient light, dully. there were other small lights on the craft, but it looked like someone had thrown a wadded-up ball of very dim christmas lights onto it, and it stuck. in other words, there was no pattern (as we would know it) to the placement of the lights on the craft. they were red, blue, and white. some were fainter than others. perhaps 20 in all.

suddenly, a light shone down from the craft like a spotlight, about 8 feet wide, very much like a spotlight on a stage. it shone the light onto a copse of trees in which an old barn was hidden. the light passed frenetically over the ruin for a few seconds; then it slipped onto the ground, traveling in an arc. i quickly calculated that it was going to “hit” us if it kept moving in the same arc. i was excited and scared. as the light came closer to where we were standing, a car came over the distant hill, from the direction we had come, and as soon as its headlights came into view, every light on the craft went out except the faint blue light in the hut.

after the car passed, the object began to move very slowly away from the road (and us), crossing the field and going toward the forest at the other end of the field. there was no way to follow it. 

as it went into the distance, a red light came on that shone dully on the tops of the trees. it sank lower to where it almost touched the tree tops. then we noticed four or five other red lights hovering over the treetops in the direction from which the first object had come, but all moving slowly toward the first one, some slower than others, as if following it. some were farther away, but all flew low to the treetops. all of them seemed to “know” each other, like a herd of cows going back to the barn. they seemed unconcerned and in no great hurry.

i went home and called the local air force base (seymour-johnson) and told an officer my story. before i got too far, he put me on hold, then another man came on, and i could tell i was on a speaker phone. they did not ridicule or laugh at or make me feel stupid. they said whatever it was was too low for their radar to pick up, and there was no military exercise or game going on in that area. i had no idea whether they spoke the truth or not. i never heard back from them, although i gave them my contact information. i think they recorded my call.
content.summary: Sighting near farmville, nc in 1987

content.detailedDescription: I work at buffalo niagara international airport. i was leaving work at approximately 0528 est when i glanced up to look at the sky and i saw 5 to 6 lights pass slowly overhead moving in an odd non-patterned configuration moving from ne to sw. at first i thought it was just a jet taking off, but there was no sound and there were no beacon lights flashing. i lost sight of the lights as they passed over the sw edge of the airport. the sighting lasted approximately 15 to 20 seconds. i have been working at buf for over 13 years, and i have never seen anything like this before. i am a u.S.A.F. veteran, and still am a current federal employee. i have held a top secret sci/tk clearance in the af and still hold a secret clearance with dhs/tsa. i had a previous second sighting of an anomalous object, but that occurred back in the 80's.
content.summary: Odd lights over airport

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what it is so i'm sending pictures
content.summary: Not sure what it was a friend said to come here and ask

content.detailedDescription:
I was on a dirt road that passes in front of our land fill here in sheridan wy when i noticed a yellow streak above the big horn mountains.
it  generated what looked like a flame instead of a white trail like a plane. in fact the whole object looked like one big flame. i was too far away to see the object causing the yellow trail. trail was wide too. wasn't long though was three quarters of an inch to see from where i parked.
i watched the object go into a cloud and waited for it to come out the other end but it did not so i proceeded along the road to feed some stray cats. it was no jet. object was probably 50 to 60 miles from me due west.I believe we are being visited. i have seen several objects in my life. have seen some little beings about one inch tall twice in my yard observing me a few years ago. in the seventies i was visited in a dream by some beings. i thought it was just a dream until they showed up one night in my living room. i tried to communicate with them but my feet decided i needed to exit the room. they lit up the wall a bright white and made the door knob a black spot. so they were not here to harm me i figured. in my dream they came through a doorway from another dimension. so i know they can communicate through your dreams. three months from the dream they appeared here in my house. this house  has always been  grand central station for seeing paranormal things. 
people should set up sighting stations with cameras and video, scopes etc to catch these goings on. truly fascinating i think. space and matter is ancient times infinity old. who knows who or what lives out there on other planets or even our own planet. i hope know one ever shoots at there ships. take care.
content.summary: Bright orange flying from south to north along big horn mountains at cloud level.

content.detailedDescription:
Driving n on us 54 in nm , left alamogordo maybe 10 minutes.
suddenly 1 then 2 then 3 fireballs . streaking one direction the back , one fireball had come out of the other , then reentered the same fireball, suddenly all fireballs went dark and an object with flashing lights appeared.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 1st 1 then 2,then 3 fireballs, shooting ouot and back into each other, then lights out, then a craft

content.detailedDescription:
On the evening of june 19th 2014 , i went outdoor to photograph the on-and-off flashing ufos (as i've watched it first for few seconds through my window) , i've taken in total 4 pics but only 3 of which had them on the camera showed up . there were several (approx 8) of the objects in the sky but more showed on pictures .
 the 1st photo was taken at 9:48:07 pm , 2nd at 9:49:23 pm , 3rd at 9:49:35 pm . 
i have isolated & enlarged couple of the brightest &  best looking as evidence record which i'm including in this report . as always much delighted at witnessing them . this date the 19th plus 1 from previous day & 2 following days were great to see them pass by in the area , as the yr 2014 wasn't much of sightings , so these were a true treat to see . couple of them had very unusual shapes , as you can see in the attachments .
but in any case in comparison , the 2013 was really amazing !
content.summary: Took 4 photos , only 3 of which show lightships in the evening sky , photo close-ups are included in this report

content.detailedDescription: On march 9th 2016 my wife and i were on our back deck smoking a cigarette. for the last 2 weeks i've noticed a very bright light in the sky, that was way to big and bright to be a star. the position of the object did not move with the spinning of the earth. i've necer saw the object do anything until tonight. 7 months ago i had my first ufo experience at the same address. i was out until 5am and saw over 10 ufos that night, i also see the phenomenon almost daily because i believe i know what to look for. due to this i always look up at the sky at night. i knew the object was a ufo and it was a matter of time until i caught it doing strange things. my wife and i noticed the object pulsating it would go from super bright to completely dark. during the time the object was dim it moved erratically moving up down left and right. it repeated this for roughly 10 mins before shooting down at a 90â° angle. i was in awe. i've seen many strange things in the sky but it never gets old. my wife thinks i'm crazy and im delighted she got to witness it. she's now watching you tube videos:). my phone wouldn't record the object i have a high resolution camera i recorded my previous sightings, which i will reteive to upload a future sighting. if i stay out long enough i'm sure i'll see one again soon.
content.summary: Bright light size of a huge star. pulsating moving all directions. erratic movements.

content.detailedDescription: I am hesitant to report this since there was an eclipse yesterday but i am not certain when or if they happened close to the same time. i was on flight dl1800 from atlanta to boston, an hour after take off i saw the object out my window for a brief time. it was cigar shaped with a hot white glow and a flat black area inside it. it left no trail or had any flashing lights. the view was clear as there weren't many clouds in the sky at the time. it was flying at a 45 degree angle away from the path we were on. it was blocked from my view by the wing shortly after i spotted it. no one else on the plane seemed to see it as i heard no one say anything but i didn't see anyone else looking out the window at the time either. it very well could have been something easily explained but i am left with no answers.
content.summary: On flight

content.detailedDescription: We were driving south on a highway at approx 10 pm, we saw a bright light that seemed to be curving, when we got to it we got out of the car and tried to figure out what it could possibly be, it was a very bright blue/white light about 10 feet in diameter, it did not make any sound nor did it shine a light down. after about 10 minutes it split into 3 small parts two went off to the left and one went directly south and disappeared at a very high speed. when it broke into three parts there was a white light on the front and a red light on the back but no real shape. we did not feel frightened but i did feel disappointed when it was gone.
content.summary: Large bright object at the side of the road about the hight of a telephone pole, just sat there with no sound for 10 minutes then split into 3 small objects and went in different directions

content.detailedDescription: In my backyard.  sometimes it is as if they pop out from nowhere/descend and travel from me.
content.summary: Orb traveling very fast to the ne

content.detailedDescription: I observe all sightings in my backyard.  i see them often and in varying shapes, colors, directions and speeds.  i've checked the satellite maps for today and there is no indication that this object could have been a satellite.  todays object moved faster than those i've seen before.  once the object travels past the suns reflective light, i lose sight of it, approximately 5 minutes.
content.summary: Orb made of material that reflects light

content.detailedDescription: I live in england but this incident happened about two years ago on the island of trinidad in the caribbean. the incident happened after a movie night out with two friends. after the movies as we walked out the cinema exit door i turned to my right to see if a bakery was still opened. as i turned my head i saw a huge glowing red ball flying across the sky above the bakery and other buildings on the compound. it looked as though it was descending and appeared to have descended into the fields behind the compound. however my view was obscured by the buildings as the object decended. it was moving horizontal to the ground below it but an easterly direction so definately flying and not just falling from the sky, and it seemed to be lowering itself as though landing at the same time. i did shout and i pointed toward the sky to alert my two friends but it was moving so fast that only one of my two friends managed to see it. it was a bright round glowing red ball of light and the color red seemed more hazy around the edges of the ball. there seemed to be an aura around it.There was no beams of light, no smoke, and no noise. it was just a huge red ball entity of glowing light.  growing up i have always loved looking at the sky and i know what a shooting and falling star looks like but this was definety unlike anything i have ever seen in my life. my first feeling was one of excitement, amazement and wonder. i wish i had the opportunity to see and observe it for longer and it has been on mind ever since. i want to know what it is i saw that evening. my friend and i spoke about it for weeks and weeks after. he saw exactly what i saw and we both speculated if it was a ''soucouyant''. the word comes from a local folklore in trinidad and is named after glowing balls of red flying orbs which the locals have believed in and have experienced for decades. i have heard stories of this growing up but never believed in it and always laughed when i heard it. i like to be logical and i always say that ''seeing is believing''. but i am still in awe about what i saw that evening so now i don't know what to believe anymore!  i am also happy my friend also saw it at that time so i could talk to someone about it who would believe me. i am a science lover and i was watching tv and saw one of mufons tv show one day and it dawned on me that what i saw and have been keeping inside me could have indeed be something perhaps out of this world?! who knows? i was also happy to know that i could be able to contact and share my experience with someone else who would like to listen. on another note i also have something my doctors refer to as ''night terrors'. in these ''night terrors'' i am always provoked or totured by dark strange human shaped shadows. when these experiences happens i also get sleep paralysis. i have had these sleep experiences even before i saw the glowing red ball of light. it has eased up quite a lot now but and i am unsure if both the ''night terrors'' and the sighting of the red glowing object are related in anyway at all? the sighting of the red glowing ball felt so different, so strange and out of this world that i found it necessary and worth sharing. this is my story.
content.summary: I witnessed a huge glowing ball entity of red light with an aura, flying over buildings

content.detailedDescription: Noticed the first ufo which was moving fast then another ufo was waiting for the first one to pass by, after the first ufo passed by the second one started folllowing it,after a while the third appeared from the direction perpendicular to the first two, travelled in straight line and vanished, two of my other friends witnessed as well,
content.summary: Noticed the first ufo which was moving fast then another ufo was waiting for the first one to pass by, after the first ufo passed by the second one started folllowing it,after a while the third appeared from the direction perpendicular to the first two,

content.detailedDescription:
Five of us witnessed this sighting, small type of orange glowing fireball was on february 24, 2016 at 8:25pm. walking out to the car to head for home, my husband, first spotted it, along with my 14 yr old son.  they called to us, a friend and her husband and myself, from where they were standing, into the house to where we were. you could see it glowing in the night sky, there were no stars visible at that time. the sky was partially cloudy, very dark. and there was the fireball moving in the slow deliberate pattern.  but only one.  we watched for more and tried to make certain that yes it was really true. there was something out in the sky at a fairly close distance to us.  it seems to me that they are right over peterson's butte, which is a few miles away. i took 2 pictures, normally my camera does not pick up star lights the night sky.  my friend took a video of what we were seeing and what we could not see with our naked eye.  as i stated in wonder during her recording.  we realized after a few minutes that at some point she had lost the object and focused on another light source. 

 after we went back inside, i looked at my pictures to see if i had gotten anything, i enlarged it and oh.My.Goodness. i had.  i had gotten two clearly non star lights. the lower one being the tower lights as we confirmed the next evening. and the higher light being what appears to be a space ship. it looks exactly like the typical sightings of the ufo “space ships”. a saucer. the lights are clearly different from all the other light patterns of the man made lights and the stars. these lights are to perfect in conformity to not be created by a being. whether it be a human or what, this is created by a being.  the next evening we tried to recreate the pictures i had taken when i first got outside to see it, at 8.27 pm.  at 8:30 pm on 2-25-16 we took pictures of the night sky again, there were no stars in the same area but i did take some shots of the radio tower that is on the butte.  that tower is in the pictures from the night before. that should help determine the distance of where it was in our sky view.   i did take several pictures of stars in the sky.  the distance of the glowing ufo and the stars are incredibly different. the stars can be barely seen on a clear night sky.
we were in excited awe of what we had just seen. we tried to "debunk" our sighting. we can't. we actually saw a ufo 
i tried to get a report of the weather on that night, the data is from salem, or not lebanon, so it is slightly different.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: To the naked eye it appeared to be an orange glowing fireball

content.detailedDescription: This photo comes from my friend when she took a picture a total solar eclipse in indonesia march.09.2016 billiton island, i saw something in conjunction with the position of the moon covering the sun as something that is round is there who can help me explain the phenomenon or whether a hot-air balloon an anomaly ufo thanks.
content.summary: Dark ball anomaly of solar eclipse

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover), Unknown
content.detailedDescription:
At the time of the sighting, i was a high school student taking an astronomy class. we had to find the planet venus for an assignment and take a picture of it. my house has a lot of tree cover, and venus was low this time of year, so i went to this location to see if i could see further on the horizon with little enough light pollution to still see venus. when i reached the location, i got out of my car and, being able to still see stars and see the horizon much clearer, confirmed this was a good spot to find venus. after this, i took a minute to admire the stars, particularly the constellation orion. then, out of the corner of my eye, i noticed a dark object shaped like a chevron moving through the sky. i first thought it was a flock of geese or other birds, but this didn't seem like a flock of birds. one reason i came to believe this was not a flock of birds was because of how fast this object was moving. with its apparent size compared to a flock of birds, birds that distance away would not appear to be moving as fast as this object. another reason was its silhouette appeared fully shaded, and not with slightly lighter patches where the space between birds would have been. thirdly, the way the object changed direction was too sharp for any birds i've ever seen. lastly, it was too symmetrical to be birds in formation. because of these four attributes of the object, i believe what i saw was not a flock of birds. in addition, this object was completely silent and had no lights on it. 

as previously stated, it flew quietly and quickly through the sky, turning somewhat sharply. eventually, i was distracted by something else and lost sight of the object, with it simply blending into the night. 

while i was watching the object, i want even sure what i was seeing was real. after seeing it, it took me a minute or two to process what i had seen. the feeling is extremely hard to describe, probably best being described as a mix of disbelief, awe, and fear mixed together. after i had lost sight of it, i quickly got back into my car and drove home.
content.summary: Dark v-shaped object in the pennsylvania night sky

content.detailedDescription:
i was 12 or 13 at the time back in 1992 or 1993.  during the summer anywhere from june-july around 10-11 p.M..  my friend billy was over and we were watching a freddy krueger movie.  our neighbor called and told my parents that ufo's had been reported above estacada.  whoever had answered the phone said that someone had called the news.  i think they even mentioned it was channel 2..  not sure its been years.  any way the response from the news was that they had heard of the reports and were not going to air anything or investigate it.  we lived about 7 miles n.W. of estacada.   so billy and i went outside and sat in the field and stared at the stars for about 10-20 minutes. 
     after a while of intently staring at the sky i noticed 3 tiny pin sized lights.  directly above us.  they seemed to be really really high.  i had never seen a satelite before.  now that i have they appeared to look like a sattelite does.  not as bright as the space station though, and possibly dimmer than an average sattelite.  one was blue, another seemed to be red and another was white.  the lights stayed within a small area in the sky and would sit still and looked like a faint star.  they would then dart to one side stop abruptly and change course at a 90 degree angle shoot to another spot not far away stop then change course again.  all 3 did this kind of right angle triangle shape dance in the sky.  

     i could clearly see the different colors as well as a movement not typical of any airplane or sattelite.  i watched in amazement as i tried describing where they were to billy.  he could not see them and became frustrated.  i think he thought i was lying or messing with him.  we sat there for at least 20-30 minutes.  i enjoyed watching them and was amazed.  he was frustrated and wanted to go back to watch the movie.
content.summary: Spotted 3 tiny lights red, blue, and white moving very quick in right angle movements.
